description:
---

###[choco://utorrent-webui](choco://utorrent-webui)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

	
![Screenshot of uTorrent WebUI](https://cdn.staticaly.com/gh/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/master/utorrent-webui/utorrent-webui_screenshot.png)

The Web UI is used to control µTorrent remotely via a modern web browser that supports AJAX.

[SOFTPEDIA's review](https://www.softpedia.com/get/Internet/Remote-Utils/uTorrent-WebUI.shtml)
[lifehacker's Remote control your torrents with uTorrent's WebUI](https://lifehacker.com/remote-control-your-torrents-with-utorrents-webui-260393)
[How-To Geek's How to Remote Control uTorrent From Your Mobile Phone](https://www.howtogeek.com/100169/how-to-remote-control-utorrent-from-your-mobile-phone/)
[HTPC Guides' Setup uTorrent Remote Access WebUI](https://www.htpcguides.com/setup-utorrent-remote-access-webui/)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/utorrent-webui/readme.md)**

---

**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**

---
summary: A web user interface to control uTorrent remotely.
author: Directrix,  Ultima
